body_html:
You can copy the orthogonal initializer code and modify it to generate correct values when a vector is requested.
…
On Sep 4, 2017 9:37 AM, "Tingbo Lu" ***@***.***> wrote: I encountered with this problem, too. Thank you for your post, or I think it will take me a lot of time to find the reason of this error. But now I still wonder what the simplest way is for me to use both peephole and orthogonal initializer, cuz peephole is the most popular variant of LSTM. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
You can copy the orthogonal initializer code and modify it to generate
correct values when a vector is requested.

On Sep 4, 2017 9:37 AM, "Tingbo Lu" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I encountered with this problem, too.
> Thank you for your post, or I think it will take me a lot of time to find
> the reason of this error.
>
> But now I still wonder what the simplest way is for me to use both
> peephole and orthogonal initializer, cuz peephole is the most popular
> variant of LSTM.
>
